alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 6:56PM MST until March 05 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 11 PM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with higher amounts of 6 to 10 inches above 8000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Jacob Lake to the North Rim. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 11 PM MST Saturday. Light snow will continue tonight, but the heavier snow is expected during the day Saturday into Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Snow forecast from 9 AM Saturday to 11 PM Saturday: Jacob Lake 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
